titles.title: For the relief of Bruce William Stewart, Dianne Stewart, Sarah Jane Caitlin Stewart, and Michael Bruce Albert Stewart.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration Policy and Enforcement.

bill.summary: 11/18/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Bruce William Stewart, Dianne Stewart, Sarah Jane Caitlin Stewart, and Michael Bruce Albert Stewart.
